description:
Provides an EventBridge Rule resource.

~> **Note:** EventBridge was formerly known as CloudWatch Events. The functionality is identical.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

EventBusName.description: The event bus to associate with this rule. If you omit this, the `default` event bus is used.

EventPattern.description: The event pattern described a JSON object. At least one of `schedule_expression` or `event_pattern` is required. See full documentation of [Events and Event Patterns in EventBridge](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eventbridge/latest/userguide/eventbridge-and-event-patterns.html) for details.

IsEnabled.description: Whether the rule should be enabled (defaults to `true`).

Name.description: The name of the rule. If omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique name. Conflicts with `name_prefix`.

NamePrefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the role that is used for target invocation.

ScheduleExpression.description: The scheduling expression. For example, `cron(0 20 * * ? *)` or `rate(5 minutes)`. At least one of `schedule_expression` or `event_pattern` is required. Can only be used on the default event bus.

Tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider [`default_tags` configuration block](/docs/providers/aws/index.html#default_tags-configuration-block) present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.
